title: It’s Not Just Pogačar: UAE Team Emirates is Closing in on All-Time Single-Season Win Record of 85
content:
The WorldTour season-ender at the Tour of Guangxi could tip UAE over the top for the all-time win record set by Columbia-HTC in 2009.

Read the full article at It’s Not Just Pogačar: UAE Team Emirates is Closing in on All-Time Single-Season Win Record of 85 on Velo.
author: ahood
